> > I think that JUnit wants by itself to differentiate b=

I have always found the difference between ERROR and FAILURE confusi=
ng and I
bet that except for JUnit experts such as yourself, nobody can rea=
lly
explain it.  

Assuming that it's important to know whether a test fail=
ed because of an
assert of an unexpected exception (a dubious proposition i=
n the first place
since when a test fails, you are going to check out the s=
tack trace anyway
and find out exactly where it failed), it would certainly=
 have been better
to name them differently.
